in the crowd. It is initialized and deployed by the main contract of CrowdProjectFactory

constructor.details: Creating a new instance of contract by CrowdProjectFactory contract. All the parameters are given by the CrowdProjectFactory contract.

params._PID: : A project Id, given by the CrowdProjectFactory.
params._maxContributers: : .A max number of project required members.

fundProject().details: It is used to transfer the funds to the project contract

getAdmin().details: It is used if the caller is the project admin or not. .

joinProject(uint8).details: It is used to add new member to the project.
